pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā upanando sakyaputto sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā bhātuno saddhivihārikassa bhikkhuno ārocesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:1.5: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā saṃghaṃ tassā āpattiyā parivāsaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:1.6: Tassa saṃgho tassā āpattiyā parivāsaṃ adāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:1.7: So parivasanto taṃ bhikkhuṃ passitvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:1.8: “ahaṃ, āvuso, sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā saṃghaṃ tassā āpattiyā parivāsaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṃgho tassā āpattiyā parivāsaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ parivasāmi, vediyāmahaṃ, āvuso, vediyatīti maṃ āyasmā dhāretū”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:1.9: “Kiṃ nu kho, āvuso, yo aññopi imaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati sopi evaṃ karotī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:1.11: “Ayaṃ, āvuso, āyasmā upanando sakyaputto sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā so me āroceti mā kassaci ārocehī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:1.14: Atha kho so bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:1.15: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:1.16: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhu bhikkhussa jānaṃ duṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ paṭicchādessatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:1.17: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, bhikkhu, bhikkhussa jānaṃ duṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ paṭicchādesī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:1.20: kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, bhikkhussa jānaṃ duṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ paṭicchādessasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:1.22: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:1.23: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa jānaṃ duṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ paṭicchādeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:2.1.8: sāmaṃ vā jānāti aññe vā tassa ārocenti, so vā āroceti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:2.1.10: cattāri ca pārājikāni terasa ca saṃghādisesā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:2.1.12: “imaṃ jānitvā codessanti, sāressanti khuṃsessanti, vambhessanti, maṅkuṃ karissanti nārocessāmī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:2.2.1: Duṭṭhullāya āpattiyā duṭṭhullāpattisaññī paṭicchādeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:2.2.2: Duṭṭhullāya āpattiyā vematiko paṭicchādeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:2.2.3: Duṭṭhullāya āpattiyā aduṭṭhullāpattisaññī paṭicchādeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:2.2.5: Anupasampannassa duṭṭhullaṃ vā aduṭṭhullaṃ vā ajjhācāraṃ paṭicchādeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:2.3.2: “saṃghassa bhaṇḍanaṃ vā kalaho vā viggaho vā vivādo vā bhavissatī”ti nāroceti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:2.3.4: “ayaṃ kakkhaḷo pharuso jīvitantarāyaṃ vā brahmacariyantarāyaṃ vā karissatī”ti nāroceti,
